title: [HOLD for payment 2023-05-16] [$1000] There is no character limit for company address and personal address
issue_repo_steps:

2. Enter company address at Step 2 of 5
3. Enter personal address at Step 3 of 5
4. Unlimited character cause unexpected error or Auth error

Expected result: There should be character limit for company address and personal address

Actual result: None
